values:
Im just like my lover, Sarah Grasso from New York City...ill explain

i love my college, i love the city that my college is located in, i love the people in my hall, and im not writing this piece on a bench in a park, more the college life-like status of in the dorm room at 12:36 after finishing some math and spanish homework and procrastinating on my Terror Trance Technology class, which i must say i absolutely love that class...have you ever felt so like inspired and questioning everything you have read and learned for the past 13 years of your life? its so ridiculous but its so fuckin amazing...ah the college life and college classes, what me liking school only took 13 years for that to happen...hahaha...or the fact that every second im in a classroom at this school its costin me 2 cents or somethin like that.

but about denver and the people, a girl might have stolen my heart from california, but i dont know if it was just one or like 500...pretty girls, me like, and awesome girls too...and most of them like hockey (are you serious)!!!!

but yeah, have been invited to montana to spend christmas with this one girl so that i can experience a "white christmas" if i'd like...and ive also been invited to stay out here and just hang out in the mountains...oh man are you kiddin me, love the kids here...but dont worry im coming home

my roomate is freakin awesome...the hallmates are freakin awesome...plus when you are at a private school, or any college for that matter, the kids are here to learn and not just dick off, its great, plus they are all pretty damn smart kids and some of these kids are gonna be important political figures no doubt

and the sports atmosphere is fantastic...everybody loves the broncos, everybody loves the avalanche, and everybody loves denver pioneers hockey...the hockey games are gonna be fuckin awesome

the one thing that sux about here tho is the cops are fuckin anal about parking...spent 168 dollars on parkin tickets and permit in 2 days...fuck that

alright definately more time for late nite reading...love and miss california

got to love this convo

"yeah so did you have fun tonite?"
"well yeah sorta i mean i had her sittin in my lap"
"thatta boy"
"yeah, i guess, but she kept like hittin me in the face with her hair and i told her to stop"
"hate when girls do that"
"so she stopped then i guess i said somethin and she started bouncin on my thigh"
"wait she was bouncin on your thigh?"
"yeah, well shes got a relatively big ass..."
"yeah but shes hot"
"yeah she is...but anyways, so shes got a big ass so shes more like bouncin in my pelvic region but the force is really on my thigh"
"thatta boy, so you did have a goodnite"
"well heres the best part, i still dont have her number"
"oh man wasted effort, wasted effort for sure"
"not really, i put no effort in and look what i got"

man, richard and i have deep conversations

and when i do put effort into a person, the person gets retarded...i cant wait to move to colorado just so that 17 hours may finally detach myself from her...i mean seriously 2 years now...a lot of off and on but for some reason have always liked this person

her bro is on the hockey team and she is ridicuously cute and a freshman and a hockey chick and rich so i think i got the trifecta

but then again, i dont want to leave, i dont want to go to the snow, i dont want to cuddle next to someone in their cabin in the rocky mountains in the most beautiful landscape in the country, sure there will be cute, rich hockey girls out there, but every place has cute girls and california, especially southern has the best lookin ladies anywhere...alright im about to cry...about 3 more weeks of work, then im quittin so i can hang out with all the califonria ladies that i can...and guys too, if they'd like

september 1st is the close of one chapter, and the beginning of a whole new exciting one

To all of you who have called yourselves SENIORS the past few months...WE ARE NOW HIGH SCHOOL GRADUATES.  Im so proud of myself, my family, and friends.  The feeling is indescribable.  Just standing in front of the stage gave me worse butterflies than anything any sport has, including state championship games, regional championship games, etc.  CONGRATULATIONS SIMI VALLEY CLASS OF 2005!!!!!

So now on to the memories of the graduation evening, June 21, 2005.
I never knew that we had soo many kids graduating from Simi Valley High School...and i never knew that some of the kids could look so intelligent in their lives.  But the cap and gown made us all look so good and smart and mature, like actually old.

I dont think I will ever forget the look Sarah Grasso had on her face during the whole entire ceremony.  Not hard to spot the ASB PRESIDENT on the platform/stage thing. But she had the widest smile on her face, looking out at her fellow graduates.  Hard to describe but it was just somethin special.  Then Michelle Bernabe throwin her fist in the air after every sentence was hilarious.

Definately going to remember Bernabes speech.  Definately a funny one...

Of course hearing my name called.  "JOHN THOMAS BLAIR"  I even appreciated the pause in between the names, just awesome and definately blushed a little.  Sorry if I celebrated a little too much but i was way stoked.  And hearing cheering after my name was awesome too.

But unfortunately, all good things come to an end.  Simi Valley High School has been a great place.  Sure you hate it at times but yet you love it even more.  There are those people you just want to beat the shit out of, but then there are more who you wish you could spend the rest of your life with.  There are the close bonds that you promise will never break, the friendships that you wish could last an eternity.  But then the real world and THE MAN ruin that and take all the fun away from everything.  Or maybe you decide to go to Denver for schooling, putting an incredible strain on those bonds.  After graduation i went out to dinner with family and close family friends and after, instead of hanging out with friends and partying, i drove around the eastern end of Simi, starting with the high school.  I visited all the schools that i attended in my educational career and also visited the Santa Susanna Pass Road, to where the first "pioneers" of Simi Valley entered the valley before the freeway came in.  Im definately going to miss this valley and everybody that i met in it.  

IM DEFINATELY GOING TO MISS EVERYBODY THAT I HAVE MET IN SIMI VALLEY, CA BUT THE SUMMER HAS JUST BEGUN SO LETS HANG OUT WHEN IM NOT WORKING AND MAKE IT THE BEST SUMMER EVER!  AGAIN CONGRATS AND STAY SAFE

hey just thought you guys should know that PROM is tomorrow...but the time most of ya'll read this it will be after but hey im way stoked...lookin forwared to dancin with kelsie and seein everybody all dressed up in their lovely dresses and lookin shnazzy in tuxes...and then afterwards is a big question mark so thats somethin to look forward to...then work at 10 sunday mornin...oh well it will be all worth it

American Cities That Best Fit You:

85% Austin
80% Denver
70% San Diego
65% Honolulu
65% Miami
Which American Cities Best Fit You?
notice the second spot with the high percentage...meant to be a maroon and gold pioneer for a few more years i guess also...couple of sweet bands coming out with new cds that you should check out and maybe buy the starting line---pretty sweet stuff waking ashland---this band is amazing, definately worth listening to AMBER PACIFIC---i have always loved this band and they finally have a full length coming out MAY 24 that EVERYBODY NEEDS to get and listen to...if you want to hear some of their new songs with some amazing old songs, go to www.purevolume.com/amberpacific

hi...its been awhile...ive been around but not far enough around to write in this thing

so happy birthday to me...thats right this year my 18th bday fell on saturday january 22nd which happened to be WINTER FORMAL which was way tight...everybody looked dazzling and pics were at my house so it was cool havin a ton of people at my house...the dance was tight...i slid all over the floor durin the tootsie roll if you didnt notice...sorry to all you i missed cuz i was just in the dancin zone ya know...hahaha...oh well it was a great nite...and casey hughes came back for a few days so that was tight too

so with finals here...i might pull off a 4.0 which would be insane and cool all at the same time...but better yet...senior year is halfway over now...i dont know whether to be excited or sad...a little bit of both i guess

ok peace out for like another month

is this fast enough

udatin so you better reply

greeley estates and tear my world apart is like my new favorite song...emo/a little screamo=great

umm school has been awesome...minus the work part...senior year is the coolest thing ever cuz i dont care about anything and its a great place to talk with friends

hockey is takin control of the life...past 3 weekends havent done anythign but hockey but really its all good...the team is great, we are winning, having a lot of fun, we are all close, its seriously like i have 18 brothers, just awesome, and did i mention we are winning this year, 15-5-3

winter break is just what i wanted...outa the house every nite and back home on time so the parents arent mad at me...yet they want me to get a job which i dont want but i need money...any place have good hours (like no weekends, early nites, etc)

but tonite i met a pretty cute chick that was small (i guess i like the small ladies)...but dont worry nothin happened (i dont know how old she is but she is in high school and no i didnt have sex with her)

thats pretty much the recap

oh ive been writin a journal since andrea gave me the idea...we are gonna share em like the last week of school or the week after school...its such a wonderful idea cuz you can put more feelings into it than into livejournal or myspace since you dont have to worry about who is reading it and yeah

stay tuned for the next update which will include top 10 or somethin countdowns...until then...love you all, dont take anything for granted, be nice not naughty cuz santa is comin to town, and straightedge is the way to be

yeah so everybody is all postin about how great last week was...you know what...mine was way sweet too...for different reasons

won 2 hockey games...first one 8-1 and the second one was 4-1 against #1 team in the league and we beat em the second time this year...score

but seriously thats not it...royal destroyed simi (damn you bean you guys won again)...yet talkin to the football guys, its not really a rivalry anymore which is cool but not...i just like things to get angry about

but friday and saturday i was a jealous little idiot and by sunday it got all cleared up and i felt good and happpy

thursday almost killed steph after we looked for non-existant napolean pastries

how cool is the oc...seriously great show...now seth cant have summer, does anna come back on the show? me hopes YES...there is seriously no guy that is that understanding about a chick and another guy when that understanding guy is crazy about the chick (that new guy im referring to)

and no more analyzing oc cuz thats gay

fellway is a sweet band...so is autumn to ashes

hopefully this weekend is tight

aight so bush man won the election...y'all know how i feel about that

the song "razorblades" by story of the year is awesome...story of the year is awesome too...but other bands still reign supreme...y'all know about them...if you dont...ask me and i'll tell ya

oh "the war" by melee is tight as well

my shakespeare in english went well...only forgot that part i always forget...but still people said it was good...davis said it couldnt be funny but oh well...and i got to wear my under-armor and it made me look...who wants to fill in the blank...(please say somethin good if you do)

dude in hockey we have lost 2 in a row...oh my gosh...weve dropped from 1st to a tie for 3rd...got to pick it up a bit, eh

girls volleyball is ending...so sad...just makes you realize just how old we are...make the most of everything you do in high school since it is rapidly comin to a close

damn applications...iven been accepted to another...but i f-in hate em...so much stress/work/money/stress/time/did i mention stress

aight

so being 18 is lookin really cool...ian turned 18 and it was a lot of fun scratchin those cards and makin a human table which was really fun but probably really gay but oh well

ummm...i got accepted to montana and northern arizona...montana looks really cool...3 cows for every person...total population 900,000...gonna become a grizzly...hhahahaha

my sister came out from colorado...that was cool...my lil sis is the one who is adopted...hahahaha

does school seem to be takin a long time to get through this year?  i mean seriously its been fun but we are still in first quarter

wow...ronald reagan library was soo freakin awesome...interviewed a kid because he thought i was part of the simi voice...too bad we dont have a simi voice anymore...andrea, sarah, and ashley almost ruined it by laughin but its all good

we lost in hockey the other day...first loss in over a month...i hate losin

my ankle hurts

so this last week has been awesome...homecoming game, homecoming dinner, homecomign dance (y'all know i had a good time), then senior dinner which was cool but now sad cuz we wont ever do that again

in chem i noticed how old i was and how young everybody else is...wow

went to apps nite and sat with mal, steph and andrea cuz there were too many asians that i woulda felt outa place...so listenin to all the counselors and decided that college sux...too much hassle to get into (if i even can)...looked at schools with andrea and noticed that most schools in california are very diversely populated...much better than 95% white at the University of Montana...then In-N-Out with mal and andrea where it was decided that me and andrea on minimum day are goin to santa barbara and on nov 11 we are goin to san diego...for college of course

andrea and mallory are baby killers...anybody else pro-choice...any jackass democrats out there...if you couldnt tell im conservative and pro-life...damn election and government classes have gotten us all debating about issues...its awesome...baby killers

matchbook romance is awesome...love "promise" right now...anybody have their cd

like "im not ok" by my chemical romance too

favorite still is "thoughts before me" and "hear we stand" by amber pacific and the "closest thing" by the juliana theory...i hate the radio...the transformation is in the process

and i feel like shit...wanna make me feel better?

aight so i had somethin called homecomin that was freakin awesome...dinner was awesome cuz alice and them had it all planned out so well...well for the most part it was great...only bad thing was my hypoglyxcemia was kickin in so if you know what that means, you know that it sux...

but the dance was sweet...and hot...and there were many sluts...hahahaha...one chick had the shortest skirt ever but tryin to find one smaller was fun...some people were really surprising tho like wow you can dance, and like that...hmmm

go hammon and sarah

i got my pictures developed...from when i went to minnesota yeah that long ago but at least i got em...and my favorite picture is from the last time i updated....picute of the sun set that is the best i could have done toward bein like ozzy...cuz it had a silohuette of a guy as the sun was settin and it was just great...or maybe i liked it cuz that day was like the greatest ever

oh yeah in hockey we are 3-0-1...i have a goal this year...yay...and i dont have any more league home games until january...hopefully we'll get some exbition games at home

im updatin cuz i feel the necessity too...i sound so damn retarded...but oh well

from the last time ive updated, some shit has gone down...went to the beach (more on that later), played in a hockey tournament (went 1-3 but played much better than that record shows), and started school (the school is so crowded as is the parkin lot and the people drivin are just f-in retards it is so f-in pissin me off)

so the beach...this seriously was probably the coolest thing all summer...went to the beach with andrea, steph, kim, alice, jeremy, and kasey squared (hughes and moran)...were there from like i dont know 130-730...watched the sunset...gave my blanket to alice only to have her move away from me as i was shiverin with my wet towels tryin to stay warm...but the sunset was awesome and somethin about it was just simply amazing...i dont know but that was cool...and the water wasnt too shabby either

first home game and regular season game sunday at 1045...i hope we win

yeah thats about how i feel right now

friday: work then movies with richard, jeremy, casey, andrea, and some chick that i didnt recognize or didnt know...oh and it was bitch at J.T. day at work by the customers...people that i didnt even serve were gettin pissed off about their crap that they bought and were takin it out on me...that just sux

saturday:  staff meetin, hockey practice, hockey meetin, team meetin...3 meetins...that was hard to stay awake through...then kims for her birthday party...lots of people like andrea, steph, alice, kristina, miller, mal, sandy, then richard, ian, justin, hammon, casey, and jeremy...oh and i met christine but everybody calls her bean and shes from royal...and pa-tricia and charles and i kicked his ass...i had fun and got denied and no one gave me massage...and i flipped over in the net thing and spilled my cake...then we watched girl next door after helpin clean up the joint...that was me, jeremy, casey, and annie and kim with drew and kasey moran

oh and i really didnt give kim a present...i just got her flowers on her real birthday cuz, well its a long story about tryin to find her a real present...maybe ill go with someone and get you that shirt i dunno...oh and my moms upset cuz i gave kim flowers for her birthday and i havent given my mom flowers for anythin...i thought i gave her flowers for mothers day but i dunno

in a confused state again...i dont know...ill figure it out...i always seem to do it

oh and tomorrows my last day of work...i guess my father is upset with my decision...oh well not the first time that would have happened...i should respect my parents more...i sorta have ive been gettin home early then they have told me so i guess thats a start and im goin to church with em at 8 in the mornin so we can go as a family...hey its a start and sorry this was long

hello

on saturday had hockey then went to kims house and saw andrea, steph, kim (it was her house so i guess i would see her), alice, york, jeremy, kasey, richard and ian...had the ping pong table fall on me then played a game of sting pong against jeremy...only lost about 11-7or 8...but i was tired and sore from hockey already...better then losin 22-3 last time

sunday had an 8 and a half hour shift at work and that just made me too tired to do anything the rest of the nite so watched the olympics...still dont get it about michael phelps and ian thorpe...oh well...im a guy so i guess that may be a reason...i mean they are amazin at their sport but i dont think thats why all the ladies love em

monday went to the harmony sweet and watched turnabout play...they were awesome again...saw justin, travis, jen chou (about time kid, oh and hopefully you enjoyed the shower as much as i did), robin, jessie, tommy, spaldin, grant, and some kid named fred...it was awesome...most of the bands were good...the first band was pretty pathetic tho so maybe thats why justins band sounded so awesome...or maybe justins band is just soo good...yeah thats it

lookin at a new job...ill tell ya if i actually pursue it...and you know who you are to help me out for it aight

i was thinkin

if marie calendar was a real woman that i was like the same age with and lived near, i would flippin marry her...i dont care how hot she is but by golly the woman can cook

oh yeah...i got a new phone...no more damn piece of shit fuckin phone that was a piece of shit and had worse coverage than a high fuckin school fuckin football team against a damn good pro team...cant you tell the breakup was a peaceful one...i think i have it lyin around my room for peoples numbers...i wanted to just like throw it at somethin then realized that wouldnt have been anythin new so i just put it somewhere...but after the first day i like this new one

oh and another thing...if i want a scholarship from my hockey club...i gotta put the application in a week...not that i had enough work to do...which i pretty much completed...i may want to do this thing too...golly flippin A man

aight so i had practice last nite and i have one thing to say

IT SHOULD BE AGAINST THE LAW TO BE THIS TIRED AND SORE

still havent puked but ive been really tired after every practice....and ive been doin shit outside of hockey to try and stay in shape...so glad i force myself to run 4-5 miles a few times a week

in better news....IM PRETTY MUCH DONE WITH SUMMER HOMEWORK...be jealous...its ok

The olympics are here for your viewing pleasure...anything that seems gay should be found on Bravo...(same station that airs queer eye for the straight guy)

the opening ceremonies were pretty awesome (yet long, what else can you expect)...especially the end cuz im a fan of the little things and seein the cauldron lower and then bein raised was freakin awesome...firework display was cool too except it started a fire on a local hill

in a soccer match showcasin iraq vs. portugal, the iraqis win...in iraq the population celebrated the victory by shootin guns in the street and blowin up cars

the us gymnastics teams qualify for the team competition...the women were pretty disappointing tho...i mean some of the positions they put themselves in is mind boggling and their body control is awesome...yet they still had some mental lapses and lost to romania where kids were polled and they want to become gymnasts when they grow up...just a little international knowledge for ya

in the news in our country: once again the governor of new jersey has made it into J.T.'s news briefs...this time its for resigning as governor because he is gay or somehtin that has to do with bein gay...not too sure

now for me...damnit missed the ventura county fair...i love ferris wheels and rigged games to waste money on...also missed the firework display...who wants to get together and work on cool ass english...my stats and history are already completed and ive done one book of english...just to darn lazy for the other two

ok some news briefs and commentary

in iraq:  we have soldiers fightin in the holy city of Najaf...honestly tho...every city it seems is a freakin muslim holy city...is it the muslims sayin "oh shit the americans are attackin and blowin up our "holy" cities...fuck the west and blow up americans."  contemplate that

kerry/bush:  havent really paid attention to this lately...all i know is that the two campaigns are campaigning in the same cities and states at the same time...oh and on that point of in the same town...kerry and bush were in the same town in ohio...while they were there, 2 banks were robbed in that small town...shouldnt there have been extra security and thus made doin anythin illegal nearly impossible...hmmmm...looks like security will suck with either guy in charge

stupid criminals:  more great stupid criminals...two guys rob a gas station...get half a mile down the road before runnin outa gas...return to the same station with the little gas tanks where they meet the local police.

for a beautiful recap of the political and world events of the past week... read sarah's report at girl_next_door

that'll do for now...dont do anythin stupid now and enjoy your last month of summer

welcome everybody...we have some news here that need to be known as soon as you read this

***funk singer rick james dies at the age of 56...terrible loss...hes dead bitch

***on a campaign visit in michigan, john kerry tells the crowd somethin along the lines that he loves buckeye football...buckeyes are ohio you dumbfuck...michigan/ohio football is one of the greatest rivalries in all of college football and all of sports...who is willin to put a wager that kerry will not win the state of michigan...and if bush wins by one vote again this year and one of the states he wins is michigan, kerry should beat the shit outa himself and not ask for a recount

thats all for those updates

lets see...i dont know what ive done...i know i had hockey and i didnt get sick and no one got sick but still some hockey players get sick durin early season conditioning...it happens...its as part of the sport as hittin...friday went to the beach with some of my teammates and other hockey players...how young is too young...hmmm and saw some dolphins...and im still white...damn whiteness...oh and saw sarah grasso...and saw and felt a bunch of kelp...yuck

oh...and amber pacific is a tight band...a little emo but whats wrong with a little emo...they still have great music

one word to explain my last 2 days: Random

aight so on monday...im talkin to andrea and her car is in the shop so she cant go anywhere....i look to my right and see this thing that says "how to excercise your brain"...one recommendation is experience a new culture and surroundings like a farmers market...so thats where we go...we try to find a farmers market and both of us dont know what that is really...so we drive along little roads leadin to oxnard and ventura and find a strawberry stand...thats our farmers market...then i drive us to the ventura mall (found it by myself), go to a i love wallpaper store, drive more on the 101, find a stretch of road that leads to a bunch or surfing beaches, then see some dolphins in the ocean...that was sweet, then go to the ventura pier, see a seal or otter or somethin...it looked dead then when we looked for it again it was gone so it was alive, found a great beach to play vball and rent bikes that seat like 10 people, drive main street ventura and see a store titled retarded kids thrift store and the abused women and children thrift store...then go home and bike 5 miles

so tuesday work...then hang out with settawin kim (who is goin to hawaii...lucky kid)...ran some errands with her...then persuade people to go to big springs to mess around...i had fun...just runnin around for really no reason and talkin with friends

tomorrow goin to another farmers market...then explorin oxnard...but first new retainer

oh yeah...there is a little motel in ventura that we are gonna rent out...its a dream...hopefully it can become a reality...it'll be sweet and awesome

aight...i found this through a random search and i found it pretty funny...its called 50 Rules for Women...i just included the good ones...and this is a more mature site...for older people to enjoy really...but we can still get some good laughs

2. Don't cut your hair. Ever

3. Don't make us guess.

4. If you ask a question you don't want an answer to,
expect an answer you don't want to hear.

5. Sometimes, he's not thinking about you.
Live with it.

8. Dogs are better than cats.

9. Sunday = Sports.
It's like the full moon or the changing of the tides.
Let it be.

10. Shopping is not everybody's idea of a good time.

11. Anything you wear is fine. Really.

14. Crying is blackmail.
Use it if you must, but don't expect us to like it.

16. Ask for what you want. Subtle hints don't work.

17. No, he doesn't know what day it is.
He never will.
Mark anniversaries on a calendar

20. Yes and No are perfectly acceptable answers

23. Foreign films are best left to foreigners

25. Anything we said 6 or 8 months ago is inadmissible in an argument

28. Yes, pissing standing up is more difficult than peeing
from point blank range. We're bound to miss sometimes

31. Let us ogle. If we don't look at other women,
how can we know how pretty you are?

32. Don't rub the lamp if you don't want the genie to come out

today had the potential of bein a good day

go to church and the priest actually finishes early

give stephanie her present...once again im a day late with the presents... i guess i like it better that way...and i wrap presents the best...oh man

made some fettucino alfredo...and i made it really wet...the sauce stood for 4 minutes and lemme tell ya...the sauce did not thicken...1st bad thing of the day

then work which is always great...lasted forever...but did manage to have some fun and watch most of the good movies (harold and kumar, napolean dynamite)

as i was leavin work, i realized i lost my retainer...i go back to work to look for it, cant find it...now my mom goes anal cuz i was home later than i said adn that i lost my retainer...then she tells me that instead of buyin me new shoulder pads, she would buy my retainer...or im gonna pay for the retainer and wont get the shoulder pads cuz i got to save money for college...damn college...damn teeth...why are they so fucked up...damn shoulder pads that i got now...they always fall outa place and are uncomfortable...damn somethin that needs to be damned

and yes... i did have a nitemare of the village creature...that damn chicken with a bores head

Im J.T. Blair, and im not reportin for duty

ok i just used a line (sorta) from kerry's speech on thursday...good speech...i think it is safe to say that im republican and kerry's speech was pretty good...bush has got some work to do to better that speech and offer the country more...well more promises that wont be kept

ive done some stuff in teh past week...heres some of the good stuff or the only stuff that i can remember

monday--went bowlin...messed up my finger and thumb tho

tuesday--work im guessin

wednesday--dont recall

thursday---hung out with richard pretty much the whole day....saw jeremy's new dog...cute little thing...much smaller than my puppies...then had poker at steph's house...i coulda been a contenda but had to go home early

friday---bowlin with ricky and matt...fun stuff...bowled a 170* the third game...dont ask about the * cuz i can say it said 170 for my score on the screen...went to jeremy's house while waitin for the showin of the village...had some fun with steph, and kim, andrea, alice, kasey and jeremy's dog and mariokart...i used to be so damn good at that game...frustratin

saturday---had hockey that made me really tired...team needs some more practice and everybody there but im still confident about next year...then went to the beach with richard, rp, and eric...caught a bat ray and crabs...it was awesome when the bat ray was caught...oh and talked to this marine guy thats goin to iraq soon...he doesnt seem to upset about goin so thats cool...

im always a day late with every thing...oh well...its all good...better late than never...

oh shit last month that we have off from school...gotta make the most of it

Welcome ladies and gentlemen to the weekly update brought to you by the awesome John Thomas Blair...in the news today...demcratic national convention, great quotes by politicians in the past month, and the democratic party platform

***the democratic party has kicked off its thrillin convention in boston, massachusettes...this convention is nothin like the original ones where after heated debates and series of votes a candidate would be picked for president...this one is to see what the clintons had to say about each other and how borin of a man john kerry really is...3 purple hearts tho...and i guarentee that you will hear about this 100 more times

***kerry's, wife theresa heinz kerry, has been in the news recently after tellin a reporter to "SHOVE IT" when she accused him of misquoting her...actually, upon further television review, the reporter was actually correct and had quoted her correctly...see, reporters can be honest people...anyways, hilary clinton stated "the woman speaks her mind...YOU GO GIRL."

welcome everybody to the news brief for saturday, july i think 24...some stuff goin on in the news today...unfortunately not too many people doin retarded stuff...but news is news

the 9/11 commission has come out with the 9/11 commission report puttin the blame of 9/11 not directly on one person or anything but sayin that congress, intelligence agencies, and the president could have done more to stop the attacks...it took them over 500 pages to say this and president bush said he would personally review what the commission had to say...that might take awile

the commission also said that America is safer but not safe enough to prevent another terrorist attack

former clinton national security advisor sandy berger has been accused of stealin copies of transcripts or somethin from the national archives...he jacked the papers by stuffin them in his pants...whats up with the clinton administration and things in their pants...anyways...berger claimed these practices to be "sloppy"...they are also a little dirty

governor of new jersey will mandate the use of report cards to grade children in elementary through middle school on their physical presence...healthy kids get an A and obese kids get an F...so now an F can mean "failure to be skinny" or simply "you are fat"...i think this sux cuz i mean a person that is fat already knows they are fat and doesnt need a f-in report card to tell them that they are obese...i wonder if someone will be re-elected in a few years

and in local news...hollywood will be banning the use of silly string on halloween nite...its been a heated discussion that the city council has been debatin for the last few months...has nothin important been goin on that council members need to spend months thinkin about silly string...other cities are thinkin of followin suit...and its been talked about banning silly string entirely...if that happens...im gonna silly string up the joint

thats about it folks...tune in on sometime durin the middle of the week and get the weekly update brought to you by john thomas blair...have a great nite, mornin, or afternoon and dont do anythin to be brought up in these news segments

for all y'all takin ap gov/econ, we are supposed to be watchin the news and updates and crap like that and i feel so special to say that ive actually done that...a little...since i want to be a broadcastor in the near future, or journalist whichever i want to do, ill give you the greatest news stories that ive heard

*  aight...so there is this big ass fire in acton, a few miles south, north, east or west of the 14 or 5, over 5,000 acres i guess.  Cause:  a red tail hawk flew into a power line and got electricuted.  so this huge ass fire that has made several hundred people evacuate their homes was caused by a bird gettin fried

* In tennessee, 4 jail inmates escaped from jail since their cell door was left unlocked.  The foursome heads to a local gas station, where each buys a 6 pack of beer.  The group celebrates their freedom by returnin back to their cell.  An extra charge of "attempted escape" was added to their sentence...only in tennessee i guess...

*  As you know, martha stewart charged with somethin in regards to her stock...sentence is 5 months in jail and 5 months house arrest...gonna suck for that housekeeper with martha around all day long...anyways, in her speech after the trial, stewart stated "i will be there for my family, friends, and beloved company."  is it me or should it be beloved family?

hey hey hey.  i finally got to do somethin on a friday nite that didnt involve my house.

i got to play hockey with ricky, salit, dusty, ozzy, vince, joe d., dan, and schwaeger and some other fagot that just ruined our fun.  if he wasnt so small i woulda knocked the kid out.  oh well, was fun, had a good pick-up game where i showcased my skills....yeah right.  only one sexy goal tho that was amazingly sexy.

then spent a little time at ricky's after gettin gas.  damnit...only 25 miles per gallon on a tank/car that should get like 32 to 36...oh well.

had to be home by 9:45 (at least my mother allowed me to go out right), so i leave rickys by 930.  now ricky lives by the rink and i hit every single light on madera and los angelos.  i think im screwed.  make it to stearns at 941.  go 50 on stearns, 65 on alamo, 55 on yosemite (not speedin too bad).  get to evenin sky and my clock says 944.  aw shit.  hit up 55 on that road that is supposed to be 25 and a cop lives on it...dont tell my mother that i went through the stop sign at a comfortable 30.  needless to say, i make it home..goin 20 up my driveway...but it was way fun...lets do it again!

thought like sharin that.  have a great weekend and a pleasant tomorrow.  snl tonite.

well...two ap tests down...and no more to go.  yay.  next year possibly 6...so excited for next year

lets begin on wednesday tho.  go to the vball game and steph, jess, dan, and hammon come as well.  gay agoura kids put their bags where we sit.  oh well.  gay game.  won easily.  but, i almost shed a few tears since it was casey, drew, tommy, and bonsbauch (spellin) last game.  then i went home

to watch some friends cuz that was all that was on.  it was like the last two episodes before the really last episode.  almost shed a few tears here too since i used to watch it all the time, but not so much now. oh well.

then watch oc, and seriously came really close to cryin now.  its just a show and ryan and seth will come back.  but like seein seth, so calm, dumbwitted, humorous, actually sad made me sad cuz hes almost like me...just he can get the ladies.

yeah, then on thursday actually watch the series finale of friends after hockey and a lengthy talk with andrea.  i think we got a little fixed, or a little of what andrea wanted.  did that make sense.  so friends was tight...the most emotional moment was when chandler and joey hugged after bustin the foosball table.  saddest part.  but it was a gay finale cuz everybody is still around.  kill some people off or have em move somewhere, not just another part of the city.

wow...what a long entry...but there is still more...

so today was ap history.  really would have liked a 5 but dont think that will happen, will settle for a 4 but the multiple choice might have fucked me.  actually sorta hard.

but the essays...thats where i did good except the dbq.  but its hard to write an essay with a song stuck in your head.  and that song was the reason by hoobastank.  i mean everything i wrote about had to do with reasons and that song just kept bein played over and over in my head.  like the rythm and the last two lines of the chorus.  pretty gay.  but still a good song.
